DOC.brief_summary: Until study do compare efficacy tubigrips plaster paris treatment lateral ankle sprain , investigator aim compare tubigrip plaster paris treatment lateral ankle sprain .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Plaster Paris Against Tubigrip Treatment Lateral Ankle Sprains
DOC.detailed_description: 200 patient enrol meet inclusion criteria.All patient give verbal well write consent inclusion study . The hospital committee ethical review board give permission study . Only 126 patient agree participate study . After informed consent obtain patient randomized patient allocate use either Tubigrip ( Group A ) Plaster Paris ( Group B ) use Block randomization . The patient TG group receive Tubigrip treatment patient POP group give knee plaster cast . Patients instruct follow 2 week 6 week . The functional score pain use outcome study
DOC.criteria: age 1840 year grade 1 2 ankle sprain permanent resident place study concomitant bone pathology recruit trial simultaneously Patients age < 18 year injury > 48 hour , fracture multiple injury neurological musculoskeletal illness comorbid associate long term disability grade 3 lateral ankle sprain
